source:  Incandescent lamp (Airam, long-life 60 W)
URL:  http://www.mv.helsinki.fi/aphalo/photobio/lamps.html
instrument:  LI-COR LI-1800 spectroradiometer
quantity:    spectral photon irradiance
unit:        micromole*m-2*sec-1*nm-1
"FILE:GR8E"
"REM: GR8 0+3           (QNTM)"
"LIMS: 300- 900NM"
"INT:  1NM"
"DATE:08/18 15:27"
"MIN:  304NM  1.416E-04"
"MAX:  900NM  1.370E+00"
